text:
@RealCandaceO @NYGovCuomo Compare to flu, this #COVID19 is like ..
The latest FluView surveillance from the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) reports that as of Jan 18, 2020, there have been 15 million cases of flu, 140,000 hospitalizations, and 8200 deaths in the US this season
